scripts.argToBashFunction:
run(){ echo ; echo "  look this does not have $1:"; dirInfo=$(ls | tr "
" " "); echo "  $dirInfo"; echo "  look this has $1:"; mkdir $1; dirInfo=$(ls | tr "
" " "); echo "  $dirInfo"; rm -rf $1; echo "  look this does not have $1:"; dirInfo=$(ls | tr "
" " "); echo "  $dirInfo"; }; run
